#The Game Features.

= Introduction =

The features are still expanding but listed below are some already included.


= Details =

The game uses libjcsi library as a back bone. I have some reserved comments about it. But I believe it will do for now. 

There are zombies and they hurt.
the player has health, hunger and thirst counters.
The player has an inventory.
Stack-able building material in the inventory.
An axe and a sledgehammer to create building material.
Some weapons including bow, hand gun and rifle.
